body:
Comment 10: 
No debug info because that one was compiled with gccgo 4.8 installed from a debian
package.

GOGC=off does not seem to make a difference.

http://paste.ubuntu.com/6517020/ has the output of the same gdb tricks when compiled
with a home-built gcc 4.9 (so with debug info) and with GOGC=off set.
